ai-tha-ap172:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap172:1.3_0: if it is entered a hut;
ai-tha-ap172:3.1_0: On the two eons have passed,
ai-tha-ap172:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap172:4.2_0: The King, having lie down on the couch.
ai-tha-ap172:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Aṅgulimāla.
ai-tha-ap172:8.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
ai-tha-ap172:10.1_0: like a dream, full of hatred,
ai-tha-ap172:10.4_0: The tortoise who is bad indeed,
ai-tha-ap172:10.6_0: Fright Wisdoms are the Four Protectors:
